message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product. Given its immense value, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider parting with it for $1,350,000. This is a fair compromise, don't you think?
Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I still can't meet it at $1,350,000. I'm willing to pay up to $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
